name: Photo Dynamics : All in one PHP album
short_description: The all in one complete photo album in php, easy to setup and easy to update. Automatic dir/file listings, set thumbnail size (GD library 2), place comments (MySQL)(smileys/ubb/ip and date logs). It's all you need for your site!
